rot.js: bundled modules

This example includes rot.js that is bundled together with your app. This is a recommended approach, as it allows you to tailor the build/compile process to your needs.

JavaScript code can be bundled/transpiled in many ways. This example uses:

  • Rollup to bundle (merge) individual source files
  • Babel to transpile (compile to older syntax) code for older browsers
  • A small script to orchestrate the process
